answers.answer: Hey, this is my 3rd pregnancy. I'm almost 39 weeks pregnant n my 2nd pregnancy I had preeclampsia. This pregnancy I didn't have preeclampsia at all n my bp has been great too. I hope u have a good pregnancy this time.

question: I had preeclampsia with my first pregnancy, the placenta had torn away from the uteran wall and my daughter and i both hemoragged. We almost didnt make it and im afraid this could happen again. Has anyone had preeclamsia or placenta abruption? If so, did it happen with all your pregnancies? What are the chances of this happening again?
title: preeclampsia??
